testSteps.description: Given a client for account creation with document identification: document type "NATIONAL_ID", document "abcdefgaga", country "PT"
And the client requesting the account creation has its register active
And the backoffice operation is from the agency "0001"
When the account creation is requested
Then the client's account is created successfully

reportData.title: User Account Creations Response
reportData.contents: <200 OK OK,RestResponse(message=User Account created successfully, data={id=202400010000, agency=1, year=2024, userId=b52a0bee-9445-4ed9-b20d-6928930abd32, balance=0.0, status=ACTIVE}),[content-type:"application/json", date:"Mon, 23 Dec 2024 23:35:47 GMT", transfer-encoding:"chunked"]>

userStory.narrative:
For a client to be able to do banking transactions as a Tiny Bank client, he needs to have an account.

  **As a** Tiny Bank client
  **I want to** create a bank account
  **So that I can** do bank transactions through Tiny Bank

rule.name: The user can create a bank account if he is already registered
